Research Projects

title: Neuro-iX
text:
Neuro-iX is run by Sylvain Bouix. This brand new lab revolves around developing robust softwares to analyse brain imaging and behavioral data for the study of mental disorders in particular schizophrenia, brain injury and chronic traumatic encephalopathy.
We advocate open science practices and the development of health technologies that are less biased, more inclusive and equitable.


Recruitment
We are currently recruiting talented applicants for MSc, PhD, postdocs positions. Undergraduate and high school students are also welcome for short- and medium- term internships. We are committed to building a diverse environment. If you’re interested in working with us, please fill out this form.
